metadata.description: Goal insights with supporting facts for interactive interface

insights.title: Exceptional High Values: Friday
insights.narrative: Friday demonstrates exceptionally high calls values, representing a significant positive outlier that stands apart from typical patterns.

supporting_facts.description: In the Bar showing calls by day, Friday has the highest value at 5570.0, which is 18% above the average of 4705.7.
In the Bar showing calls by day, Friday has the highest value at 5570.0, which is 18% above the average of 4705.7.

insights.title: Exceptional Dimensional Behavior: Negative
insights.narrative: Negative demonstrates exceptional behavior in the dimensional interaction between sentiment and channel, standing out from typical interaction patterns.

supporting_facts.description: In the Bar showing duration by sentiment, Negative has the highest value at 25.3, which is 1% above the average of 25.0.
In the Bar showing Billing Question by sentiment, Negative has the highest value at 25.1, which is 1% above the average of 24.9.
Across all series in the Bar comparing duration by sentiment, the highest value overall is 25.7 for Payments in the Negative category, which is 3% above the overall average.
In the Bar showing Call-Center by sentiment, Negative has the highest value at 25.4, which is 2% above the average of 24.9.

insights.title: Context-Dependent Dimensional Performance: Web
insights.narrative: Web shows varying duration performance depending on the combination of sentiment and channel: excelling in channel but underperforming in reason, indicating strong interaction effects.

supporting_facts.description: In the Bar showing Billing Question by reason, Web has the highest value at 25.0, which is 0% above the average of 25.0.
Across all series in the Bar comparing duration by reason, the lowest value overall is 0.0 for Payments in the Web category, which is 100% below the overall average.
Across all series in the Bar comparing duration by channel, the highest value overall is 25.4 for Very Positive in the Web category, which is 2% above the overall average.

insights.title: Exceptional Dimensional Behavior: Friday
insights.narrative: Friday demonstrates exceptional behavior in the dimensional interaction between sentiment and day, standing out from typical interaction patterns.

supporting_facts.description: In the Bar showing calls by day, Friday has the highest value at 5570.0, which is 18% above the average of 4705.7.
In the Bar showing calls by day, Friday has the highest value at 5570.0, which is 18% above the average of 4705.7.
In the Line of 10/29/2020 over timestamp, the trough is at Friday with value 0.0.
In the Bar showing Neutral by day, Friday has the highest value at 1548.0, which is 24% above the average of 1250.6.
Across all series in the Bar comparing calls by day, the highest value overall is 1869.0 for Negative in the Friday category, which is 99% above the overall average.
